department.heading: Learning with PCWT
department.subheading: PCWT aims to bridge the gap between communities and essential services by fostering awareness and participation at the local level.

department.heading: Community Health Initiatives
department.subheading: Free medical camps, fitness awareness, and public hygiene initiatives.

department.heading: Civic Engagement & Awareness
department.subheading: Empowering citizens through knowledge of rights, voting drives, and public responsibility.

department.heading: Socaial Media Awareness
department.subheading: Campaigns and outreach programs to raise awareness on social issues and injustices.
